events.message: I recently received my order but want to request a refund as the item is not what I expected and I would like to return it for a full money back.
The system has classified this case under Refund due to customer mentioning refund and return requests in their initial message.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request to ensure timely processing and support.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us regarding your order. I'm here to help you with your refund request and assist you through the process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so that we can proceed with verifying your request quickly?
The order number is 987654321, and the reason for the refund is that the product dimensions were smaller than stated on the website.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund process immediately. Please ship the product back to us using the prepaid label we will email to you shortly.
Thanks for the quick reply! I appreciate the prepaid label offer and will send the product back as soon as I receive it.
We have received your returned product and processed your refund. The amount should appear on your original payment method within 5-7 business days.
Just following up to ensure you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Closing your case now as the refund has been processed and no further issues were reported. Thank you for your patience and for contacting support.
